title: BizlyHub Website
description: The official website for BizlyHub, a software solutions company. The site showcases the company's services, portfolio, and contact information. Technologies used include HTML, CSS, JavaScript.

title: BizlyHub CRM System
description: A Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system developed for BizlyHub. This system helps manage customer interactions, track leads, and automate sales processes.

title: Mobile App for BizlyHub
description: A mobile application developed for BizlyHub. This app allows users to access payslip on their mobile devices.

title: BizlyHub Design System
description: A design system created for BizlyHub to ensure consistency and efficiency in UI/UX design across all platforms.  Tools used include Figma, Adobe XD, or Sketch.
